message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm sure you'll love. I'm willing to let it go for $150. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?
Hi Bob, thank you for your offer! I appreciate your interest in the product. After considering your proposal, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can sell it to you for $135. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit short on budget. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $110?

Hi Bob, I understand that you're still looking for a better deal. I'm willing to make another concession. I can sell it to you for $125. This is as low as I can go, so I hope we can come to an agreement.
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but I'm still trying to get the best deal possible. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $115?

Hi Bob, I understand that you're still looking for a good deal. I'm willing to make another small concession. I can sell it to you for $122.50. This is my final offer, so I hope we can come to an agreement.
I appreciate your persistence, but I'm still trying to get the best deal. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $112?
Hi Bob, I'm getting close to my minimum price, but I'm still willing to make one more concession. I can sell it to you for $117.50. This is my last offer, so I hope we can come to an agreement.
